post.title: MiniUPnPd AddPortMapping NULL pointer dereference
post.content:
Summary

Denial Of Service in MiniUPnPd due to a NULL pointer dereference in upnpredirect.c

Component

MiniUPnP

Affected versions

MiniUPnP (,2.1], fixed in 2.2.0

Description

It was discovered that MiniUPnPd incorrectly handled an empty description when port mapping. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause MiniUPnPd to crash, resulting in a denial of service.

PoC

No PoC is supplied for this issue

Vulnerability Mitigations

No vulnerability mitigations are supplied for this issue

References

NVD

NVD
post.description: CVE-2019-12110 High severity. Denial Of Service in MiniUPnPd due to a NULL pointer dereference in upnpredirect.c
